 * TPF October Newsletter
+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
| TPF October Newsletter |

+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
[0]delegatrix writes "The October edition of the [1]Perl Foundation
newsletter has been posted. This newsletter includes an interview with
White Camel winner Tim Maher."
